title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, installable from PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs/embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI) with chat, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli (maccam912/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag (vanurag/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for QA & generation pipelines.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui (oskarkook/ollama-gui)
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose (rumblecraft/ollama-docker-compose)
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open WebUI, GPU support.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated npm packages tagged 'ollama' including ollama, ollama-chat, ollama-ai, etc.

title: ollama-pypi (PyPI search)
summary: PyPI packages containing 'ollama' keyword: official SDK, LangChain, Haystack, LlamaIndex integrations.

title: ollama-reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tips, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.

title: ollama-hackernews discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing Ollama v0.1.30 release and ecosystem growth.

title: ollama-youtube tutorial
summary: YouTube walkthrough: setting up Ollama + Open WebUI + GPU support on Ubuntu.
